title: Check off your holiday shopping list with this $70 4K beginner-friendly drone
content:
Macworld

Got a drone-obsessed kid or grown-up to shop for this holiday season? While drones can be an expensive gift to look for, you don’t have to look far for an affordable and beginner-friendly option. Through November 16th, this beginner-friendly 4K drone with dual cameras and obstacle avoidance is only $69.97 (reg. $119).

This innovative drone is designed to take users to new heights with its advanced features, including the ability to do a 360° flip, fixed-point flight, gravity control, one-key start and stop, and headless mode. Its HD 4K 90° front camera and 120° wide angle bottom camera enable users to snap stunning aerial views, while its optical flow positioning makes it easy to keep this drone in place.

One feature that rookie fliers will especially love is this drone’s three-way obstacle avoidance. This allows the drone to perceive obstacles like trees, plants, walls, and more in advance so it doesn’t crash into them. However, the manufacturer recommends using this feature indoors since it can limit the drone’s speed.

Gift a loved one this 4K Dual-Camera Drone for Beginners with Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance for just $69.97 through November 16th at 11:59pm P.T. No coupon required!
